Class Focus

  • Constructor Details

    • Focus

      public Focus​(int duration, float damageMultiplierBonus, Broadsword broadsword)
      Constructor for creating a Focus skill.
      Parameters:
      duration - The duration (number of turns) for which the skill remains active
      damageMultiplierBonus - The bonus to the weapon's damage multiplier
      broadsword - The Broadsword associated with this skill

  • Method Details

    • activateSkill

      public void activateSkill​(Actor actor)
      Activate the Focus skill for an actor. This method is called when an actor activates the Focus skill. It starts the active process for the associated Broadsword, resets the turn count, increases the weapon's damage multiplier, and consumes stamina from the actor.
      Specified by:
      activateSkill in class Skill
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor who activates the Focus skill

    • deactivateSkill

      public void deactivateSkill()
      Deactivate the Focus skill. This method deactivates the Focus skill, resetting the Broadsword's damage multiplier and ending the active process.
      Specified by:
      deactivateSkill in class Skill

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Get a string representation of the Focus skill.
      Specified by:
      toString in class Skill
      Returns:
      A string describing the Focus skill and its effects.
